text: Aba yadi allahale tapa'ila'i uniharuko kunai samuhatira pharka'era laga'epachi ani bhavisyama tiniharule tapa'insita yud'dha maidanama niskana anumati cahanchan bhane ta bhanidinush â€˜â€˜timiharu mero sathama kahilyai pani niskana sakdainau ra na ta mero sathama kunai satrusamga ladna sakchau. Timile pahilopataka nai basirakhna rucayau, tasartha aba pachi parneharukai sathama basirakha
